MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD5 postcode area of Kelso. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 4:30pm to safely complete repairs on our overhead line equipment and this may be affecting the supply to your property. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of previous access issues and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:28pm on Saturday, 27 March 2021
